extendedInfo.description: Your walking and talking tour of historic Clarendon County, South Carolina. This full GPS enabled, multilingual talking history tour phone app includes dozens of historical points around Clarendon County. Start the app, turn up the volume, and drop the phone in your pocket. As you approach each site, the app will begin telling you the history of that spot in what every language you desire. If you are not in the area, no problem, just select sites from the interactive map or select the tour mode which will take you to each point during a non-stop talking history tour.At the heart of this tour are the Historic Swamp Fox Murals depicting the American Revolution and General Francis Marion, sites of Francis Marion's encounters with the British and the ancient Santee Indian Mound. Tour Clarendon County, South Carolina now with this free phone app.Besides history, the Clarendon County Tour also provides tours of just Churches and Eating places to help you select among the many fine places to worship and eat around Clarendon County.The Clarendon County Tour Quick Start guide and details of app functions are at the following site:http://www.historysoft.com/fox/help.htmH--Appy Tours!

reviews.comment: Clarendon tour app reads the history markers, gives map and location,  takes you to sites, gives websites, is great to learn about Clarendon &historical churches & cemeteries & places to eat.
reviews.author: Carole Summers
